mapper.insert: insert into guarantee (sn, productName, customer_id, dueTime, remark) values (#{sn,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{productname,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, #{customer.id,jdbcType=BIGINT}, #{duetime,jdbcType=TIMESTAMP}, #{remark,jdbcType=VARCHAR})
mapper.select: select g.id, g.sn, g.productName, g.dueTime, g.remark, c.id as customer_id,c.name as customer_name FROM guarantee g left join customer c on g.customer_id = c.id

where.if: AND (g.productName like concat("%",#{keyword},"%") OR g.sn like concat("%",#{keyword},"%"))

mapper.update: update guarantee set dueTime = #{duetime} where id = #{id}
